variables.var2: His name is {name} and he works as a {job}.

select.default: {gender, select, male {He} female {She} other {They}} liked this

plural.format: {count, plural, =0 {There are no results.} one {There is one result.} other {There are # results.}}
plural.offset: {adds, plural, offset:1 =0 {No-one has added this} =1 {You added this} one {You and one other person added this} other {You and # others added this}}

selectordinal: You are {pos, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} in the queue.

number.decimal: The default value is {count, number, decimal}.
number.percent: The default value is {count, number, percent}.
